H0.text: Blood pressure is written as systolic over diastolic.

H1.text: Blood position is written as systolic over diastolic when recording blood pressure.

H2.text: Fractional pressure is written as systolic over diastolic.

H3.text: Brain pressure is written as systolic over diastolic.

A4.text: Blood pressure is usually expressed in terms of the systolic pressure (maximum pressure during one heartbeat) over diastolic pressure (minimum pressure between two heartbeats) in the cardiac cycle.
